original_text: At that time, the king of Assyria had left Lachish city. When the Assyrian officer heard that news, he left Jerusalem. He went to meet the king at Libnah, where the king was now fighting a battle.
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이 라기스를 떠났다 함을 듣고 랍사게가 돌아가다가 그 왕을 만나니 립나를 치고 있더라

sentences.original_text: the king of Assyria had left Lachish city
When the Assyrian officer heard that news
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 관원이 그 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: He went to meet the king at Libnah
where the king was now fighting a battle
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그곳에서 전투를 하고 있었기 때문입니다
